title: Can I drive my car with no windshield? - Quora

response.answer_text: Can you? Sure you can, the windshield won’t stop you! Should you? Probably not. First thought, is it legal in your state to operate a motor vehicle without a windshield? Then other things come to mind, ever catch a bug in your eye at highway speed? Not a problem, I got some nifty RayBan sun glasses… but it’s night time! and it’s raining and it’s cold out and…. Note to self… get windshield replaced.

I had an old Jeep (1978 CJ 5) and I called the State Police, they told me that if there was a place for the windshield, it had to be intact. But since it had the capability to fold down I could do this, but use eye protection for obvious reasons. That’s the only exception I can think of. (And yes, it was FUN)
